quote: That’s what’s new. There used to be the option of opting out. But now that’s over. Completion is the end. We’re closing the circle around everyone—it’s a totalitarian nightmare.
quote_letters: THATS WHATS NEW THERE USED TO BE THE OPTION OF OPTING OUT BUT NOW THATS OVER COMPLETION IS THE END WERE CLOSING THE CIRCLE AROUND EVERYONE-ITS A TOTALITARIAN NIGHTMARE
